channel.title: Xinu on JohnnyReedDocs
channel.description: Recent content in Xinu on JohnnyReedDocs

item.title: Posting comp.os.xinu
item.description: Back in the day I ported xinu to and i960CA processor. This is a posting I made to comp.os.xinu describing the port. If you have access to Google Groups, the original post is here: xinu port to i960. Xinu on the i960CA Note*** The following message is for ch...@gestetner.oz.au (Mario Mendes) but in general I would be interested in discussing this with anyone. I attempted to mail this to chris around December 1990.
